patthana18.14:1.1: Sappaccayaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana18.14:2.1: Sappaccayaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhataṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
patthana18.14:3.1: Anidassanaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.14:4.1: Anidassanaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana18.14:5.1: Appaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.14:6.1: Appaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana18.14:7.1: Arūpiṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.14:8.1: Rūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:9.1: Arūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.14:10.1: Lokiyaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana18.14:11.1: Lokuttaraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana18.14:12.1: Lokiyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana18.14:13.1: Lokuttaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana18.14:14.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.14:15.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.14:16.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuñca nakenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana18.14:17.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
